create gmmd.ts:153 
create(drawing: object) → {}

Create a drawing. example: const id = game.graphics.create({p:[0,0],a: 0,attach:"world",attachId:-1,scale: [1,1],shapes:[{type:"bx",p:[0,0],size:[10,10],a: 0,color: 0xffffff}]});
